topic.title: Good Luck, I am Behind 7 VPNs
topic.body: Just updating the old adage, don't use proxies, use nested VPNs.

topic.title: Attention Journalists. Auction: Riseup and Daily Stormer Invites
topic.body:
Are you an impartial journalist who wants to do undercover investigations of both the extremist left and the extremist right?
A good start is by infiltrating these two groups: Riseup (left/email) and Daily Stormer (right/bbs).
If you are having a hard time getting an invite for these two, maybe I can help.
I have aged accounts on both and am willing to invite you, for a fee.

If interested, express how much you desire this (in BTC).
A good way to show you are serious is to write your say under a URL controlled by your organization.
Something like zeronews.com/randomlengthkey12345/offer.txt
Then send me the link over ZeroMail.
If there are competing offers, I will pick the highest.

There is no time limit. Once we have a winner, I will announce here that this is over.

1568774393_1AShkCrzACE7Gm6gan8WqQMhBfYVd.body:
> [applebrainz](#comment_3_1QKBw5pHsSUokVZXrvLmo4PiPytto86CMu): Kinda freaking out.  found cp by mistake on 0chan porn, and now im terrified.

Feds are powerless if you use nested VPNs plus Tor.
